summary: Pedro is a famous singer who fall in love with a psychiatrist girlfriend, he decides to attend to the doctor with the story that he does not like women. The psychiatric nurse helps him with the girl as she is in love with the doctor.
cast: Peret|Conchita Bautista|Patty Shepard|Carla Araque|Antonio Ozores|Mariano Ozores Francés|Adolfo Torrado|Ana María Morales|María Fiorella|Paquita Villalba|Nuria Gimeno|Adoración Vázquez|José Sazatornil|Gracita Morales|José Luis López Vázquez|Bárbara Rey
title: A mí las mujeres, ni fu ni fa
